By car, Portsmouth can be accessed using U.S. Route 23 (North/South) and U.S. Route 52 (East/West).  Greyhound serves Portsmouth as well.  By boat, Portsmouth can be accessed by using the Ohio River.  By Canoe, Portsmouth can be accessed using the Scioto River.   By Plane, Portsmouth can be accessed through the Portsmouth Regional Airport located in nearby Minford.
Other than a couple cab companies, there are no forms of public transit.  Although, a traveler can easily walk to many locations downtown.

The Ramada Inn is located right downtown near the river.  Other chain hotels are located in the north side of the city and in nearby Wheelersburg, east of Portsmouth.

value: 4404 State Route 125, Portsmouth.  Located in the 63,000-acre Shawnee forest, the Shawnee Resort & Conference Center offers a many vacation attractions and amenities, golfing along Ohio River, indoor or outdoor pool. 65 miles of adjacent hiking trails, ideal for avid hikers or photographers. A cedar and flagstone lodge with 50 rooms, 25 2 bedroom cottages, and the O-Hee-Yuh Restaurant.
